channel.title: configurations on Meteor-Z个人播客
channel.description: Recent content in configurations on Meteor-Z个人播客

item.title: iOS开发配置
item.description: 软件 超级右键 Xcode HomeBrew RVM 安装命令：rvm install ruby-3.1.7 --with-openssl-dir=$（brew --prefix）/opt/openssl@1.1 Terminal git clone https://github.com/zsh-users/zsh-syntax-highlighting.git ${ZSH_CUSTOM:-~/.oh-my-zsh/custom}/plugins/zsh-syntax-highlighting git clone https://github.com/zsh-users/zsh-autosuggestions ${ZSH_CUSTOM:-~/.oh-my-zsh/custom}/plugins/zsh-autosuggestions plugins=(git zsh-syntax-highlighting zsh-autosuggestions sudo) 软件安装 brew install
